metadata.title: CVE-2021-22206 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting all versions starting from11.6. Pull mirror credentials are exposed that allows other maintainers tobe able to view the credentials in plain-text,

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
